import React, { Component } from 'react' import ReactHighcharts from 'react-highcharts' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import DatePicker from 'react-datepicker' import Select from 'react-select' import 'react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css' import { LargeHeading } from '@/components/headings' import { WeeklyActiveUsers, DailyActiveUser, MonthlyActiveUsers, NewUser, NewAndRepeatUser, PurchaseSuccess, conversionRole, } from './chartConfig' import './index.scss' import API from '@/utils/Api' import { SmallHeading } from '@/components/headings/index' const selectTheme = theme => ({ ...theme, borderRadius: 0, colors: { ...theme.colors, text: '#f1f1f1', primary25: '#74d69e', primary: '#74d69e', }, }) class OverViewPage extends Component { state = { startDate: new Date(), platformType: 'android', endDate: new Date(), } updatePlatForm = d => { console.log(d) this.setState({ platformType: d.value, }) } getReportingData = () => { const { startDate, endDate, platformType } = this.state const d = API.getOverviewReportData({ startDate: startDate.toJSON(), endDate: endDate.toJSON(), platformType, }) console.log(d) //getApit } handleChange = date => { this.setState({ startDate: date, }) } getPlatFormList = () => { return [ { value: 'android', label: 'android', }, { value: 'ios', label: 'ios', }, { value: 'web', label: 'web', }, ] } render() { const { startDate } = this.state return (
